website_summaries.verdict: Users love these sliders' curved surface, which better keeps feet from sliding off.
pros: Curved surface keeps feet where you want them, making your workout more effective and preventing injuries
You get a set of strength slides and a set of floor-protecting booties
Work on carpet or hardwood floor
Nearly frisbee-sized, so larger feet won't slide off
cons: More expensive, since they're branded by Beachbody
Some users report these will not glide on thick shag carpet or rubberized flooring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The BEST sliders around. I’m on day 51 of 80DO and have been using cheap-o sliders. These are GAME CHANGERS!! Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these if you do Beachbody workouts
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these instead of going through Beachbody directly as they have high shipping costs. Great for using with the Beachbody workouts. I first ordered a different pair of cheaper sliders from here and they were crap. Too small. These are larger and can be used on either carpet/rugs or hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought some really inexpensive slides to do 80 day obsession and discovered quickly that they weren’t going to cut it. They were essentially cheap furniture movers and were too small to put both feet on for some of the moves. I decided to bite the bullet and buy these and I am SO glad I did! These are absolutely amazing! They glide so well without being too slippery, they are a great size. Awesome product. Don’t waist your money by trying to save money on cheap slides, just buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: They seem just like the ones Autumn uses on Beach Body on Demand!
customer_reviews.text: I tried inexpensive ones and they were awful. Still scratched my wood floors so I ended up putting furniture felt on the bottom which made them a little awkward and they were just not the same as these. They are really easy to use, feet fit better in them and I wish they had been available when I order the first ones. I love them and they are worth the extra money without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice oversize slides.
customer_reviews.text: These seem expensive for basically being purpose shaped frisbees with a fabric cover, but try finding something better suited for a lower price and you'll find yourself stumped. Maybe you could piece together actual frisbees with some type of fabric cover and achieve the same benefits, but you'd be hard pressed to do so I'm sure. The long and short, I'm not using these for any "system" but do use them for several sliding floor/body weight exercises. the larger size and fabric cover means I can readily do any ground sliding exercise on my hardwood floors without issue. Maybe eventually the fabric will wear through, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Broc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my Physical Therapist used!
customer_reviews.text: This slider may cost more, but it is great to use, on a wood floor or tile (with the cover/bootie). Easy to use on a thick rug, without the bootie. I avoided the cheap ones, with the 5-star ratings. I checked the lower star ratings. I'm not an professional reviewer. Just an average person, in an American small town.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncritic

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: if you're thinking of buying cheaper slides, don't do it--just buy the beach body ones! You'll end up coming back and buying the beach body ones. They work awesome--way better than the other ones that I've used. And they work you so great!
customer_reviews.author: mrsT

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd round of 80 day obsession. I bought cheap sliders at target and I had a pair from Beachbody but they were a different kind. These are AMAZING!! What a difference!!! These will be a game changer for me. My feet don't slide off, they are well made and can handle having both of your feet on one slide. Beachbody price is 29.95 plus if you are a coach there is a discount, but you have to pay for shipping. Either way, Get them if you are doing a workout that requires sliders, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wharton

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are a game changer if you have some cheapos. These are definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on here saying that these are a game changer weren’t kidding! I was using the cheaper slider discs & they were not good. Leaving black marks on the floor, and the worst was I was using my hip flexors more to move them than my abs. These sliders glide so easily so you can really focus on your core. I did phase 1 of 80 Day Obsession with crappy sliders & I’m so happy I have these for phase 2! They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Burns

customer_reviews.title: Best. Sliders. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 separate sliders. These are the only ones I recommend. Before I was constantly losing one during tougher exercises using only 1 foot. But theses stay under foot and slide with ease. 12/10 recommend. Definitely worth the money. The booties they come with will protect wood floor and if you use them without they would perfect on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Sema

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on Berber carpet or rubber gym flooring
customer_reviews.text: So many of the reviews said they slid great on all surfaces. I tried these both on my carpet (Berber carpet) and my rubber gym flooring and they did not slide easily on either of them. Missed my return window by 4 days and now I’m stuck with them :(
customer_reviews.author: Dlphnfrvr

customer_reviews.title: So much better than other sliders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought cheap sliders to use when I started working out. I could never do the full workout. I had to move my "home gym" out to my garage which has concrete floors so I bought these and it is a world of difference!! I absolutely recommend getting these and not cheaping out on any other sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the cheap $10 slides for exercise. I struggled so badly with them whether I wore sneakers or not. Finally took the plunge and ordered these slides. They are amazing!!! So worth it!! They are huge and the actually stay under your feet with or without sneakers. I can finally keep up in my workouts and my abs actually hurt!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rose

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: The cloth covers did not hold up for the 80 days need an easier way to just get replacement booties
customer_reviews.author: Micahel C Brauer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all on my carpeting. I am sure in the right surface they would be great. Good size on the disk and they seemed very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A must for 80DO
customer_reviews.text: We attempted at using some cheap no-name slides and quickly realized we needed to just buy these bad boys. Glad we did. Half way through phase 2 and loving it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Sliders
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much easier to use than cheaper slides. These slide easily but my feet stay on them and I get proper range of motion. Well worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sliders
customer_reviews.text: These are must have for BB programs of any program needing slides. I wasted more money trying to save money! I should have ordered these from the start.
customer_reviews.author: sallee decker

customer_reviews.title: A must have to any fitness buff
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Gives your workout that extra test of strength and endurance and gives a killer quad and ab workout. Helps get deep into the muscles
customer_reviews.author: K Peak, Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders
customer_reviews.text: The best sliders i've ever used. The removable sleeves make them very convenient for all types of floors. Don't really work on mats. So you need to have carpet or or hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: They scratched my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: The material booties that covers the plastic is not soft. They have left scuff marks on my hardwood. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good way to stretch muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a great additions to my workouts. It’s required for my current Beachbody program but I enjoy it for extra stretching as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Great slides
customer_reviews.text: these slides are great. I bought others before and they wouldn't stay under my feet but this brand does. They are easy to keep under my feet during my workout and slide across the carpet so much easier due to the shape. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had been using cheaper sliders and decided to treat myself to the BB brand slides and these are 10000000% worth the price. Your feet down slip off due to the bowl shape.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Houseman

customer_reviews.title: The covers are not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with my PIYO DVDs. The plastic is hard and durable but the coverings are not staying in place during exercise. I constantly have to stop and readjust them. It definitely reduces the range of motion and tempo.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolitsa Wooten

customer_reviews.title: much better
customer_reviews.text: Ive order sliders but not these im excited they are bigger compare to the ones i have, better workouts
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you need sliders, this is exactly what you should get. I made the mistake of getting cheaper ones and got these anyways and it is a million times better.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra peterson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but no one else makes them in this larger size. These are a must for 80 day obsession. The smaller sizes are frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: DBMusic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I bought a cheap set when I first started 80 Day Obsession and I should have just bought these first.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I’ve used some cheaper ones and you can definitely tell a difference! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They won’t slide out from under your feet!
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are the BEST!! Don’t go with the cheap ones out there they are not worth it. Spend the extra $ to make a BIG difference in your workout.
customer_reviews.author: amandamarie21

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in hardwood not on berber carpet
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent on hard wood floors. I have berber carpet and did not slide on those at all
customer_reviews.author: ronda o

customer_reviews.title: Takes time
customer_reviews.text: Just takes a little to get use to the movement and strength to do it.
customer_reviews.author: arly frye

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money 100%
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if there would be a difference between these slides and the cheaper brands but wow was I surprised on how much better the beachbody brand is.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift for my wife and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this are the best sliders for 80day workout
customer_reviews.text: The Best!!! Don’t waste your money buying other brand like I did..
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Best Slides
customer_reviews.text: These slides work so well. I tried two cheaper brands and ended up returning them both. Definitely recommend these sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Truth & Right

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They work for carpet or hard floors depending on whether the covers are on. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tavalaiccio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beachbody videos
customer_reviews.text: These look just Ike the ones in the Beachbody videos- much better quality than some others Ive purchased
customer_reviews.author: BMB

customer_reviews.title: Get these
customer_reviews.text: If you need sliders, Beachbody is the way to go. Other wise your wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much easier to use than other brands that have flat slides! Love them and would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Hack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: These slides will take a lot of abuse! They are so much tougher than the original glides
customer_reviews.author: Marillyn Goepfert

product_meta.title: Beachbody Strength Slides and Booties
product_meta.description:
Ready to increase the intensity of your workouts? 

Work multiple muscles at once when you incorporate the Beachbody Strength Slides. 

Originally designed for use with the PiYo Strength accelerated workouts, the Beachbody Strength Slides with Booties will help you maximize any workout—especially those with lunges, push-ups, side squats, mountain climbers, and more! 

With the Strength Slides, you'll work harder to stabilize yourself as you engage your core, stimulate your glutes, and activate muscles you never even knew you had for a body you never knew you could get! Want to recruit more muscles during push-ups? Put the Strength Slides under your hands to turn your standard push-up into a sliding push-up, which uses even more muscles. Or, to challenge your lower abs, place them under your feet as you repeatedly slide your feet from plank position to pike. Plus, you can use the slides on a variety of smooth surfaces throughout your home. How? Just slip the Booties over the slides!
feature_bullets: Designed to increased intensity of your PiYo workout
Recommended for use with the PiYo Strength accelerated workouts
Set of 2 each (2 Strength Slides + 2 Booties)
You can use the slides on a variety of smooth surfaces throughout your home
